item.title: Bears hire David Walker as running backs coachFeb 09, 2022The Bears on Wednesday hired David Walker as their new running backs coach. Walker boasts 25 years of coaching experience, including seven in the NFL as a running backs coach with the Colts (2011-14) and Lions (2016-18).

item.title: Bears hire Ryan Poles as general managerJan 25, 2022After an extensive 13-day search process, the Bears on Tuesday hired Ryan Poles to be their next general manager. Poles spent the past 13 years with the Chiefs, including the 2021 season as executive director of player personnel.

item.title: New Bears GM Poles interviews Caldwell for coaching jobJan 25, 2022On the same day he was hired as Bears general manager, Ryan Poles on Tuesday interviewed Jim Caldwell for the team's head-coaching position.
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Bears interview Khan, Brown for general manager jobJan 24, 2022The Bears on Monday interviewed Omar Khan and Morocco Brown for their general manager position. Both individuals possess more than 20 years of NFL experience.

item.title: Pace, Nagy relieved of duties with the BearsJan 10, 2022One day after concluding their disappointing 2021 season with a 31-17 loss to the Vikings, the Bears on Monday relieved general manager Ryan Pace and head coach Matt Nagy of their duties.

item.title: Bears QBs Fields, Dalton return to practiceDec 29, 2021After sitting out last Sunday's game in Seattle with injuries, the Bears' top two quarterbacks returned to practice Wednesday—starter Justin Fields (ankle) was limited, while backup Andy Dalton (groin) was a full participant.

item.title: Bears' Quinn, Grant selected to Pro BowlDec 20, 2021Outside linebacker Robert Quinn and return specialist Jakeem Grant have been voted to represent the Bears on the NFC Pro Bowl team.

item.title: Bears DC Desai cleared from COVID protocolDec 20, 2021Appearing on WBBM Newsradio 780 AM and 105.9 FM Monday morning, Bears coach Matt Nagy revealed that defensive coordinator Sean Desai has been cleared from COVID-19 protocol and will coach against the Vikings.

item.title: Bears announce coordinator assignmentsDec 20, 2021The Bears revealed Saturday who would replace coordinators Bill Lazor, Sean Desai and Chris Tabor if they're not removed from COVID protocol prior to Monday night's game against the Vikings.

item.title: Hicks downgraded to out for Packers gameDec 12, 2021Akiem Hicks had expressed hope Friday that he'd be able to return from an ankle injury that has sidelined him for three games and play Sunday night against the Packers. But the veteran defensive tackle was downgraded from questionable to out on Saturday.

item.title: Rookie QB Fields to start for Bears in Green BayDec 12, 2021Bears coach Matt Nagy announced Wednesday that rookie quarterback Justin Fields was medically cleared after missing two games with cracked ribs and will start against the Packers Sunday night in Green Bay.

item.title: Quinn chosen NFC defensive player of monthDec 02, 2021Bears outside linebacker Robert Quinn has been named the NFC defensive player of the month for November after registering 5.5 sacks, 14 tackles, five tackles-for-loss and two forced fumbles in three games.

item.title: Rookie OT Teven Jenkins returns to practiceNov 15, 2021Bears rookie tackle Teven Jenkins returned to practice Monday for the first time since offseason workouts. The second-round pick from Oklahoma State had been sidelined with a back injury that required surgery Aug. 18.

item.title: Nagy out of COVID protocol, back with BearsNov 04, 2021Meeting in-person with reporters Thursday, Matt Nagy revealed that he cleared COVID-19 protocol and returned to Halas Hall on Tuesday, ending an eight-day quarantine.

item.title: Nagy will not coach Sunday's game vs. 49ersOct 31, 2021Matt Nagy remains quarantined after testing positive for COVID-19 Monday and will not coach Sunday's home game against the 49ers. Special teams coordinator Chris Tabor will assume head-coaching duties for the contest.

item.title: Nagy reveals Fields will start Sunday in ClevelandSep 22, 2021With veteran Andy Dalton unable to play due to a knee injury, rookie quarterback Justin Fields will make his first NFL start Sunday when the Bears visit the Browns. Coach Matt Nagy made the announcement Wednesday before practice.

item.title: Bears still evaluating Dalton's knee injurySep 20, 2021Quarterback Andy Dalton's status is uncertain for this week's game in Cleveland after he exited Sunday's win over the Bengals with a knee injury.
